{

  dh->val = 0.0;
  zerogradSlaterDet(dh);

  calcgradT(Q, X, dX, dh);
  if (P->cm)
    calcgradTCM(Q, X, dX, dh);
  calcgradPotential(P, Q, X, dX, dh);
}
